channel.title: CVE Feed for Enbra -- AT-WMBUS-16-2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Enbra -- AT-WMBUS-16-2

item.title: CVE-2021-34573|2024-08-04T00:19:46.616Z -- enbra -- at-wmbus-16-2
item.description: In Enbra EWM in Version 1.7.29 together with several tested wireless M-Bus Sensors the events backflow and "no flow" are not reconized or misinterpreted. This may lead to wrong values and missing events.

item.title: CVE-2021-34571|2024-08-04T00:12:50.369Z -- enbra -- at-wmbus-16-2
item.description: Multiple Wireless M-Bus devices by Enbra use Hard-coded Credentials in Security mode 5 without an option to change the encryption key. An adversary can learn all information that is available in Enbra EWM.
